title: A Storm Approaches
description:
A classic Call of Cthulhu game with Lovecraftian horror
It is the 21st of December 1931. You, along with another group of academics are on your way to a research facility on the northernmost island on Svalbard. As the ferry moors you can see a storm quickly approaching. A strong gust makes the pier creek, and the other passengers decide to take the ferry back to the mainland, leaving the five of you left on the pier. Watching the ferry disappear into the mist you can feel the wind growing ever stronger. You will need to seek shelter before it starts pouring down, but looking to the research facility it seems oddly quiet. Shouldn‚Äôt you get greeted by someone?

Premade characters will be used

title: Atarashii Naginata: lajin√§yt√∂s ja kokeiluharjoitukset
description:
Mik√§ ihme on naginata? Kuinka sit√§ k√§ytet√§√§n ja miss√§ naginataa voi harjoitella?

Tule katsomaan lyhyt esitys naginatasta ja sen k√§yt√∂st√§, jonka j√§lkeen p√§√§set kokeilemaan aseenk√§ytt√∂√§ ja oppimaan muutaman perusly√∂nnin sek√§ torjunnan.

Atarashii naginata eli "uusi" naginata on toisen maailmansodan j√§lkeen kouluja varten kehitetty budo-laji. Kamppailulajissa harjoitellaan ja kilpaillaan naginatalla eli japanilaisella peitsell√§. Lajiin kuuluu t√§yskontaktiottelua suojavarustein, kuten kendossa, sek√§ muodollisia kata liikesarja harjoituksia.

Alun perin naginata oli jalkav√§en ase, jota k√§ytettiin etenkin ratsuv√§ke√§ vastaan. My√∂hemmin naginatasta tuli suosittu samuraiden vaimojen keskuudessa, sill√§ aseen pituus antoi ylily√∂ntiaseman miekkaa k√§ytt√§vi√§ vastustajia vastaan.

Esittely√§ voi tulla seuraamaan ilman ilmoittautumista.

--

What on earth is a naginata? How does one use it and where can one practice naginata?

Come and see a short presentation on what is naginata and how it's used. After the show you can try out how to use a naginata and learn some basic attack- and blocking techniques.

Atarashii naginata aka "new" naginata is budo-martial art that was developed for school sports curriculum after the second world war. In the martial art practitioners use a Japanese halberd, naginata, in full contact battles with protective gear and in specific movement sequences called kata.

Originally naginata was a weapon that foot-soldiers used against cavalry. Later on, naginata became a popular weapon among the wives of samurai, because its length gave a significant advantage against those who wielded a sword.

No sign-up is needed for the presentation.

Seurallamme ei ole lapsille soveltuvia naginatoja. Ala-aste ik√§iset ovat tervetulleita kokeilemaan mutta aseen k√§ytt√§minen saattaa olla vaikeaa sen pituuden takia. Normaali naginata on yleens√§ noin 2,05m-2,15m pitk√§, mink√§ takia budo-laji sopii hyvin yl√§-asteik√§isest√§ yl√∂sp√§in oleville.

title: Aude RPG: The Tournament | Join to become a noble knight! [ENG]
description:
The Count of Aude has announced a tournament in honour of his daughter's birthday, and you're invited! Join the summer tournament to take part in three days of competitions and feasting, with the chance for you and your companions to win fame and fortune.

Aude is a Carcassonne-inspired indie roleplaying game which focuses on narrative whilst maintaining a tactical element. Tasks are resolved depending on how many meeples you are willing to spend, not by rolling dice! You should arrive prepared for roleplay, but there will also be cinematic combat. The setting is fictionalised medieval France, and takes inspiration from Arthurian legends and chansons-du-geste.

Everything you need, from rules to meeples, will be provided. Character creation consists of two decisions, so can be done on the day, or you can use a pre-made character.

This game will be run in English; the GM does not speak Finnish and the rules handouts will also be in English.

description:
Your party is taking a break from adventuring to do a favor for an old friend by running their cafe, the Drowsy Dragon. You'll cook, serve food and drinks, and try to help the colorful local customers with their problems.

title: Centauri Chronicle - Pirate Hunt at Whitman's Wedding
description:
A long standing feud between two major Clans in the Shelter Valley region, the Whitmans and the Bolognas, is seemingly coming to an end as two young heirs of major estates are set to be wed. However, a number of raids have recently taken place along their land claims' border, with cattle rustling, robbery and even murder, acts that could tarnish a Clan's reputation or lead to being declared as Pirates.

Youngsters from the neighboring Carrolls Clan, facing a threat from their other neighbors, are depending on Whitmans and Bolognas to stay strong - can they serve as a neutral party, broker a peace and investigate these Pirates in time for the wedding, or is the whole Shelter Valley swallowed in a feud flashpoint?

The game is "Centauri Chronicle" based on Looking Glass' "Terra Nova" game from 1996.
Science Fiction colonization setting in Alpha Centauri, with diverse societies, intrigue, subterfuge, and power armoured combat.

title: Chronicles of Eldara: The Crimson Masquerade
description:
You are invited to a decadent masquerade held by the enigmatic House Dracul, a noble bloodline whispered about in the darker corners of Eldara. The promise: rare wines, opulent company, and untold favors. But beneath the velvet and candlelight lies a chilling truth‚Äîthis is no celebration. It is a ritual. And you are not a guest... You are the offering.

As the hour grows late, the party will become a massacre‚Äîeach guest marked for death in the most depraved game of entertainment murder. Will you uncover the secrets of the Dracul estate that enable your escape, or will you become part of the feast?

Genre: Gothic Horror / Intrigue / Survival
Style: Roleplay-heavy with investigative and survival elements
Players: 4‚Äì6

title: Color Theory: Color Mixing in Miniature Painting
description:
Come and learn how to apply colors based on a reference! This workshop teaches you how to analyze colors in an image and then mix them from primary colors. The exercise will be conducted by painting on a flat surface, yet after its completion, you should have the skills to be able to apply these skills on your own miniatures.

This workshop is a follow-up to the lecture ‚ÄúColor Theory for Miniature Painting‚Äù, so prior knowledge of its contents will be valuable in getting the most out of the workshop. Alternatively, basic knowledge of color mixing will help you. The exercise paints and materials will be provided by the organizers but it would be appreciated, if participants brought some wet palettes and used paintbrushes to the session.

scheduleItems.title: Color Theory: Color Mixing in Miniature Painting
scheduleItems.location: Hall 5B Miniature Workshop Area (5B Workshop Area)

title: Color Theory: Creating a Color Scheme
description: Come and learn how to create color schemes for your painting projects! This workshop teaches you how to create a color scheme for your 32 mm wargaming or role-playing miniatures. The concepts discussed revolve around color theory, specifically, the different types of contrast and color harmonies typically utilized in miniature painting. Miniature painting skills are not necessarily required during the workshop, as the exercise will be completed on a flat paper surface. The workshop is a follow-up to the lecture "Color Theory for Miniature Painting" so prior knowledge of its contents will be valuable in getting the most out of the workshop. Some exercise materials will be provided by the workshop organizers but participants may wish to bring their own tools, such as color pencils, crayons, color markers, water colors, or acrylic paints.

scheduleItems.title: Color Theory: Creating a Color Scheme

title: Containment Mission: Frost Maelstrom
description:
A "Frying Dome" heatwave scorches Helsinki and people desperately seek relief. Some seem to overdo it somehow, though, because at least a dozen people have been found frozen to death across the city! The media haven't caught on this yet, and the Triangle Agency would have it remain so. Time for you Field Agents to seek out the Anomaly causing this, contain it and take care of any loose ends. 
All in a day's work. 
Clock in. Save the world.

Triangle Agency is a cute-but-horrific rules-light RPG of paranormal investigation and corporate horror. The player characters work for a multinational and interdimensional reality-altering corporation, wielding fabulous powers and confronting paranormal entities while juggling work in the office, personal life and their strange abilities.

Content warning: body horror, freezing, violence

description:

title: DayDream
description:
DayDream is a TTRPG with players‚Äô characters in the focus. You worked in a huge corporation financing various research projects and sent to study some ruins that had been discovered on an island in the middle of nowhere. However, nothing interesting was found apart from half-spheric holes in a stone temple. Disappointed by the failure, expedition staff was ready to return home and boarded already when the captain noticed a storm going to you too quickly for a natural disaster. A hurricane quickly forms and causes a shipwreck, and, after a while, you wake up on a strange Island in a completely unknown world... 
The players will experience one day of the Island's life, meet the creatures leaving there, and unravel some mysteries of this artificially created world.

title: Dread Dino Survivors
description:

Valitettavasti saari sattuu olemaan Dinotopian saari ‚Äì paikka, jonne miljard√∂√∂ri halusi rakentaa huvipuiston kaltaisen alueen henkiin her√§tetyist√§ dinosauruksista itselleen ja muille rikkaille maksajille.

Ette ole varmoja, miksi saari on suljettu ja kielletty ulkopuolisilta, mutta nyt olette t√§√§ll√§ ja teid√§n on l√∂ydett√§v√§ keino selviyty√§. Ehk√§ soittamalla apua, l√∂yt√§m√§ll√§ turvapaikka tai muulla ratkaisulla, jonka avulla selvi√§tte myrskyn yli.

Kaikki dinosaurukset voivat olla vaaraksi hahmoille omilla tavoillaan, sek√§ kuka tiet√§√§ mit√§ salaisuuksia saarella on piilossa.

Teemana on hahmon fyysinen vahingon pelko ja mahdollisesti pieni j√§nnityksen nousu vaikeaksi muuttuvan torni my√∂t√§. Helppo pelata, mutta armoton peli systeemi. Pelaajille helppo aloittaa tyhj√§st√§, eik√§ ole muita "noppia" kuin huojuvatorni.

(EN)
A horror game using the Dread system, where players try to survive a mysterious island that appears to be inhabited by dinosaurs.

You are part of a group that was either working on or traveling aboard a luxury yacht, which unfortunately gets shipwrecked on a large island. As it turns out, the island is none other than Dinotopia ‚Äì a place where a billionaire once tried to build a theme-park-like resort filled with resurrected dinosaurs for himself and other wealthy elites.

You're not sure why the island is now closed off and forbidden to outsiders, but now you're here ‚Äì and you need to find a way to survive. Whether by calling for help, finding a safe haven, or discovering another solution, you must make it through the storm.

Every dinosaur can be dangerous to the characters in their own way, and who knows what other secrets are on the island.
Prepare for suspense, fear, and prehistoric peril. üß±üß†ü¶ï"

The theme centers around the fear of physical harm to the character and a rising sense of tension as the tower becomes more unstable. Easy to play, but a ruthless game system. It's easy for players to jump in from scratch, and there are no other 'dice' than the wobbly tower.

title: Echoes of the Haunted
description:
Totem is an investigative horror game in which the Game Master plays a Spirit trapped in our world, while the players take on the roles of Seekers trying to contact the entity and uncover its tragic past in order to exorcise the Haunted Location.

It is a map-making game: the Seekers take turns describing what they sense, feel, and do, and then sketch the environment they explore on a sheet of paper. The GM builds the narrative by expanding on the players‚Äô descriptions and drawings.

Totem is heavily based on improvisation and draws inspiration from ghost stories and their tropes to recreate a horror movie‚Äìlike experience. It is well suited for beginners.

At the beginning of the game, we‚Äôll discuss any potentially sensitive topics to ensure they are excluded from the narrative.

Kilpailijamme kohtaavat erilaisia haasteita, joissa heid√§n ihmisyytt√§√§n koetellaan mit√§ kiperimmin tavoin. Voittajalle on luvassa 100 000 euron palkinto!"

title: Evernight
description:
One day, without warning, the sky splintered and cracked. Then, from that wound-like break, darkness poured out, swallowing up the blue. People talk about how suddenly it felt as if they were falling. Or maybe flying. Maybe being dragged into hell. And when it was over, it became clear that the world had changed. Or, possibly, you were in a whole different world altogether. Only one thing is certain: this world is Dark. And whatever lives in the Dark wants to keep you there.

Evernight is an intense, collaborative storytelling game that leans heavily on the themes of tragic horror and the opressive, ever-present threat of death. If hope, despair, inevitable failure and characters driven to the brink are something you enjoy, you are most welcomed to join this experience. Characters are created at the start of the game. The game includes and deals with heavy themes, to the inclusion of which the players do have some degree of control over. The game is played in a dimly lit/dark space.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Fear of death, death, violence, loss, horror elements

title: Fall of Stormshield
description:
Between the endless sea and a great wasteland, lies Haven. For a long, long time, safe and sound; but as times change, so does the wind. Before, it brought rain - now, there is only sand. A storm is coming, and this time there is nothing to stop it: the great Stormshield has fallen.

And so, protectors of Haven must leave their homes. Search a way to the ruins beyond wasteland, battle deadly machines and finally - hopefully - find a fix for it all. Should they fail, all hope will be buried by sand.


Fall of Stormshield is a story of impending doom in a world that has already ended once. It is also a game where each character has their very own mechanics to play with - but the focus is on story. If themes related to natural disasters, climate change or end-of-world scenarios are not you cup of tea, this game is not for your.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Natural disasters, end-of-world scenarios, climate change, monsters, (non-graphic) violence

title: Fear and Loathing in Paradise
description:
Welcome to the Paradise of Velara Prime

An Unparalleled Adventure Awaits You!

Step into a world untouched by time and crafted by nature‚Äôs artistry. Velara Prime is the crown jewel of the Arcturos Imperium‚Äôs newest frontier, an unspoiled haven where luxury meets the sublime. Nestled amidst breathtaking vistas and teeming with wonders, our exclusive resort offers a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to experience the majesty of a world freshly settled and meticulously prepared for discerning explorers like you.

A Virgin World Awaits

Velara Prime is a pristine paradise, its ecosystems unmarred by industrial sprawl. This is your chance to be among the first to set foot on a planet still breathing with its ancient, untamed beauty. Bask in the exclusivity of an experience few can claim to have had. Our state-of-the-art resort combines the finest comforts with the splendor of the wild. Indulge in five-star accommodations, gourmet dining with locally inspired menus, and personalized service that anticipates your every desire.

Encounter Velara Prime‚Äôs gentle giants, iridescent avian creatures, and glowing flora in their natural habitats. Guided tours ensure a safe and intimate connection with the planet‚Äôs wonders.

For the Discerning Explorer, Velara Prime is more than a destination‚Äîit is an invitation to discover the extraordinary. Become part of history as you explore the newest addition to the Arcturos Imperium‚Äôs legacy. Whether you seek adventure, relaxation, or enlightenment, Velara Prime promises an experience that will resonate in your soul.

Availability is Limited! As one of the Imperium‚Äôs most exclusive retreats, Velara Prime welcomes only a select few at a time. Don‚Äôt miss your chance to secure your place among the pioneers of this exquisite world.

Book Your Journey Today! Contact our Imperial Concierge at +Imperium-Velara or visit our holographic portal.

Velara Prime: Where Discovery Meets Indulgence.

title: Fiasco: Dragon Slayers
description:
This game can be played in Fin/Swe/Eng, depending on participants.

Fiasco is a GM-less game played in a few hours with no preparation. During a game you engineer and play out stupid, disastrous situations, usually at the intersection of greed, fear, and lust. This game focuses on the fallout after a group of fantasy adventurers with poor impulse control wipes out a mythical monster, and then sticks around to reap their well-earned rewards.

This is well-suited for beginners and veterans alike, and generally encourages very dark humour and creating horrible situations, which is why it is aimed at adults.
We will utilise the "Let's Not" mechanic if needed to rewind&revise uncomfortable themes.
All game pieces are in English.

------------
Fiasco on muutaman tunnin valmistelematon peli ilman pelinjohtajaa. Pelin aikana kehit√§t typeri√§, katastrofaalisia tilanteita, jotka usein syntyv√§t ahneudesta, pelosta tai himosta. T√§ll√§ kertaa n√§hd√§√§n mit√§ tapahtuu sen j√§lkeen, kun huonolla impulssinhallinnalla varustautuneet fantasiaseikkailijat ovat kukistaneet myyttisen hirvi√∂n ja olisi aika jakaa palkkio.

Peli sopii hyvin sek√§ aloittelijoille ett√§ kokeneille. Mekaniikat rohkaisevat mustaan huumoriin ja kamalien tilanteiden luomiseen, mik√§ vuoksi peli on suunnattu aikuisille.
K√§yt√∂ss√§ on tarvittaessa "Let's Not"-mekaniikka, mik√§li aiheet osuvat liian l√§helle omaa mukavuusaluetta.
Pelin kortit ovat englanniksi.

The content of this game depends completely on what the players bring to the table.
The "Let's Not" mechanism is used to avoid specific situations.
If you have specific triggers, please let us discuss them before we start so everyone can have a good time!

description:
Tule laulamaan filk-lauluja kanssamme! Filkit ovat scifi- ja fantasia-aiheisia lauluja, jotka lainaavat usein tuttuja melodioita uusilla, n√∂rteill√§ sanoituksilla ‚Äì toki my√∂s t√§ysin uusiakin s√§vellyksi√§ mahtuu mukaan. Sanoituksia l√∂ytyy niin Tolkienin, Cthulhun ja Star Warsinkin yst√§v√§ville. Laulujen sanat heijastetaan sein√§lle, joten mukaan hypp√§√§minen on helppoa. title: Gears of Chronan: Steampunk Adventure
description:
Steampunk-henkinen aarteenry√∂st√∂seikkailu Dungeons & Dragons 5e 2014 -s√§√§nn√∂ill√§, jaossa on valmiit 5. tason hahmot ja peli on hyvin aloittelijayst√§v√§llinen. T√§m√§ seikkailu pelautettiin viimeksi Ropeconissa 2023, ja tekee nyt paluun. Olette tulleet Mestarikeksij√§ Marvellanin Kellopelitorniin etsim√§√§n kaaosartefaktia, jonka h√§nen v√§itet√§√§n l√∂yt√§neen. Olette kuitenkin kaikki j√§√§neet yksitellen vangeiksi, mutta ehk√§ yhteisty√∂ll√§ selvi√§tte tornin ansoista ja muista salaisuuksista.

A steampunk heist adventure with Dungeons & Dragons 5e 2014 rules, with preprepared 5th level characters and a beginner-friendly vibe. This one-shot was last played in Ropecon 2023, and is making a return now. You have come to Master Artificer Marvellan's Clockwork Tower in search of a chaos artifact he's been claimed to have discovered. However, one by one you've found yourself imprisoned, but maybe by banding together you can overcome the many traps and secrets of the tower.

title: Glitched Glamour and Shining Chrome
description:
Have you ever wanted to experience what it feels like to be a cyberpunk or an edgerunner tough guy in a dark future where massive corporations rule the world and human life might be cheaper than ever? Well now's your chance Choom!

The city you live in is only now beginning to recover from an event years ago, when a rocker madman detonated a bomb in the corporate zone. Since then, chaos between various gangs has ruled the streets. Ordinary people are just trying to survive from one day to the next.

You and your crew hardcore punks are lounging in a well-known mercenary bar called The Serpent‚Äôs Venom, when a fixer you know sends a message about a new and extremely urgent gig.

The famous pop star Mia Flower was en route to her concert when her convoy was attacked by an unknown party. Her vehicle was forced off the highway into one of the city‚Äôs rougher zones. The private security company responsible for the transport is currently unable to send reinforcements to the area. However, according to the latest intel, the target is still alive‚Äîalongside some staff members and a few guards‚Äîand they may be hiding somewhere nearby the crash site.

Desperate, the pop star‚Äôs manager‚Äîwho also happens to be her aunt‚Äîhas reached out to anyone she can find for help, and your fixer‚Äôs name came up. He immediately contacted his trusted crew of heavy-hitters. The job is simple: locate the target and bring her back home safely. The mission may be dangerous, but that‚Äôs why he called you. The pay is also very attractive and what do cyberpunks live for if not for the thrill of the next big gig and a big stack of eddies.

Quickly grab your gear‚Äîyou don‚Äôt have much time. You're not even sure who or what exactly attacked the convoy. It could‚Äôve been a random act of violence‚Ä¶ or a carefully planned kidnapping.

title: Green Stuff and Milliput Basics for Miniature Conversions
description:
Learn the basics of working with epoxy putties like Green Stuff and Milliput to convert your miniatures. Tools, materials and miniatures are provided in the workshop but you are welcome to bring your own. The workshop covers the following agenda:
- Safety when working with epoxy putties
- Properties of Green Stuff and Milliput
- Tools
- Basics of working with epoxy putties
- Practical trials
Workshop will be held in English but individual guidance and translations can be provided in Finnish or German

title: Halkeamien takana / Beyond the cracks
description:
Tutussa turvallisessa todellisuudessa on halkeamia. S√§r√∂reunaisia ja odottamattomia, jotka viev√§t maailmamme ulkopuolelle ihmeellisiin ja vaarallisiin paikkoihin: muinaisten valtakuntien unohdetuille kujille, outoihin alati muuttuviin uniin, el√§m√§n alkul√§hteille ja sen katkeraan loppuun. There are cracks in our familiar safe reality. Jagged-edged and unexpected, they take outside our world into wondrous and dangerous places: forgotten alleyways of ancient realms, strange forever changing dreams, to the very source of life and to its bitter end. Did you step through accidentally, for your curiosity or after a long search?
Game includes violence and other horror elements.

title: Happojalostamon tapaus / Incident at the Acid Refinery
description:

--

In the corner of the local galactic sector is Rokarth, a gigantic hive city housing 30 billion lives toiling amidst smoke and ash for the Imperium and its' Emperor's eternal work. Same day following the next...or is it? There are rumors about a miracle in the Acid Refinery. Is it a real miracle, or something darker? The greatest local power wielding Inquisitor has hired your group to investigate.

Game system: WH40K: Imperium Maledictum
Content warning: violence, slavery, facism, body horror

A group of strangers from the city of thieves awakens in a gloomy chamber, at the mercy of grotesque homunculi creatures. It's only minutes before they would be spliced in the hands of these malformed beings as part of a sacrificial ritual or perhaps a nightmarish experiment of weird sciences. The sounds of bloody battle approach from behind the sturdy doors. Confused about their situation and stripped of weapons, these unfortunate strangers must figure out where they are and how to get back home alive. This may not prove to be an easy task, as they have been brought further from home than they might realize.

The game system is the rules-lite Black Sword Hack. The game is classic sword and sorcery, where players try to survive a desperate and strange situation. The tone is darkly adventurous, with a dash of macabre humor. This game uses roster of colorful pre-made characters.

Keywords: Sword & Sorcery, dark fantasy, faction play, bodyhorror, blood and guts, Elric, possible PVP, NSR.

title: I Saw What I Saw - Mothership Scifi Horror RPG one-shot
description:
Desperate for money, your space ship crew consented to have a vision apparatus drilled into your skull for workplace safety testing. You awaken from the operation with no one to greet you, all your weapons missing, and heavy stomping echoing down the station's hallway.

Now is your change to experince the great Mothership RPG! I Saw What I Saw is a oneshot made by me, set on a recearch station where something has gone terribly wrong.

We create characters for the game on the spot, no need for materials from the players. No prior RPG experience is needed.

This adventure is ment to be fun more than scary. But it is a horror game system and as the publicher states: "Mothership is a horror game for mature audiences. It contains violence, foul language, some sexual content, drug use, and depictions of mental illness, trauma, stress, and panic that may not be suitable for all audiences. Please be advised."

If you are not able to join, you have a change to host it!
Grab the free rules from Tuesday Knight Games -site
and the adventure from
https://doublemonk.itch.io/i-saw-what-i-saw

Actual play of the adventure can be found from K√∂yh√§t Ritarit podcast (in Finnish).

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Panic, violence, claustrofobia, stress, animal cruelty

-----
What do Smaug and Benedict Cumberbatch have in common? Are you pondering about the acoustics of a dragon's speech? Do you want to design talking bird humanoids? Does speech in your world need more depth and details? Come ask a phonetician for advice and brainstorm together!

The clinic can begin with a short introduction, if the participants so wish. After that we'll go through the participant's questions and try to crack speech related world building problems as  group.

You can arrive late or go early as you need during the program slot.

There is no sign-up required for this workshop.

title: Improty√∂paja: Tuokiokuvia toisista maailmoista - Improv workshop: Slice of life from other worlds
description:
Jos t√§m√§ on totta, mik√§ muu on totta? T√§m√§ on tarvittaessa kaksikielinen (suomi-englanti) improvisaatioteatterity√∂paja, jossa luodaan toisia maailmoja maalaamalla (scene painting) ja hyp√§t√§√§n v√§lill√§ kohtauksiin katsomaan el√§m√§√§ niiss√§. Hy√∂dynn√§mme my√∂s periaatetta "l√∂yd√§ keksimisen sijaan". T√§h√§n pajaan osallistuvilta toivotaan hieman improvisaatioteatterin perusteiden tuntemista (hyv√§ksyminen, yhdess√§ rakentaminen, kuunteleminen, moka  on lahja -periaate). Jos sinulla on larppikokemusta, voit todenn√§k√∂isesti hyp√§t√§ helposti mukaan. T√§ss√§ ty√∂pajassa liikutaan paljon ja k√§ytet√§√§n kehoa. Ensin tehd√§√§n l√§mmittelyharjoituksia, sitten luodaan maailmoja ja kohtauksia pareittain ja yhdess√§. Aluksi keskustellaan vapaaehtoisuuden periaatteesta, turvallisuudesta ja odotuksista. Lopuksi k√§yd√§√§n my√∂s lyhyt loppukeskustelu.

Ty√∂pajaan on ennakkoilmoittautuminen Konstissa lauantaina 26.7. klo 12. 

If this is true, what else is true? This is a bilingual (Finnish-English) improvisational theatre workshop, where we create other worlds by scene painting and hop into scenes to look at life in them. We will also use the principle of ‚Äòfind, instead of inventing‚Äô. Participants in this workshop are expected to know little bit the basics of improvisational theatre (acceptance, building together, listening, the principle of ‚Äúfailure is a gift‚Äù). If you have larp experience, you can probably easily hop in.

Participating in this workshop includes movement and using the body. First we do warm-up exercises, then we create worlds and scenes in pairs and together. We start by discussing principal of voluntariness, safety and expectations. The worshop is also finished with a short discussion.

Sign-up for this workshop is in Konsti.  Sign-up begins on Saturday 26th 12PM.

title: In the Darkness We Roam
description:
Setting:
Imagine a pleasant high fantasy world where everything is beautiful and wonderful. Suddenly, demon-spitting portals start to emerge all around the world. In just a few hundred years, most people are forced to live in a few safe havens, focusing on daily survival.

Story so far:
You decided to go and destroy the portal closest to your so-called home. Normally, such a plan would be insane, but you are not normal. You were born special, holding some of the power from the other side of the portals. However, using such power isn't cheap, and you had to make sacrifices to get what you want. Despite the odds, you managed to destroy the portal. Now, you need to get back home. Due to breaking your promises and hurting others to succeed in your goal, you no longer have a guide to take you back. How will you find your way home, and how will you face the dangers awaiting you on your travels?

Game Mechanics:
The game uses a Fate-based system. Pre-made characters are provided, and no prior experience with Fate is required.

Genre and Playstyle:
The genre is grim dark fantasy, and the playstyle is "monsters as superheroes."

Language and Accessibility:
The game will be in English, or in Finnish if all participants speak Finnish.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: death, killing, demons, desperation

title: Indiehuone / Indie Room / Indierummet
description:
Indiehuone tarjoaa 1-3 tunnin mittaisia indieroolipelikokemuksia matalalla kynnyksell√§ ja ilman ennakkoilmoittaumista tai ennakkovalmistautumista. Osa peleist√§ on pelinjohtajattomia, pelaajia voi olla noin 1-6 peli√§ kohden (tarjolla on siis my√∂s soolopelej√§). Pelit ovat pelattavissa k√§vij√∂iden kesken itsen√§isesti, mutta paikalla on my√∂s fasilitaattoreita, jotka tarvittaessa auttavat pelien kanssa. L√§ht√∂kohtaisesti kaikki pelit soveltuvat my√∂s t√§ysin aloittelijoille. Indieroolipelit ovat tyypillisesti ei-kaupallisia ja kokeellisia, usein my√∂s minimalistisia. Pelej√§ on humoristisista synkkiin ja genrej√§ on laidasta laitaan.

The Indie Room offers 1-3 hour long indie role playing experiences with a low threshold and without sign-up or preparation. Some of the games don't require a game master, and there can be approximately 1-6 players per game (solo games are also available). The games can be played amongst visitors independently, but there are also facilitators present to assist with the games. In principle, all games are also suitable for complete beginners. Indie role-playing games are typically non-commercial and experimental, often also minimalistic. Games range from humoristic to dark, and represent a wide range of genres.

Facilitation is available in Finnish, English and Swedish.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings:
Pelien vapaamuotoisuuden vuoksi niiss√§ voi esiinty√§ l√§hes mit√§ tahansa teemoja. Suosittelemme ja tarjoamme turva-/kommunikaatioty√∂kaluja, kuten X-kortteja.
Due to the freeform nature of the games almost any themes can potentially be brought up. We recommend and provide safety and communication tools, such as X-cards.

title: Interstellar wars - Destiny in stars
description:
The year is 2098, Earth has recovered from the great crash of the 2030-ies and is now reaching for the stars. The invention of grav-drive opened the space up but stars were still too far away. Now the United Nations Space Coordination Agency has developed a jump-drive capable of an interstellar journey. As the Starleaper One prepares for its maiden voyage to Barnard's star, Ziru Sirka, the ancient grand empire of the stars lies waiting.

Interstellar wars is a mini campaign, taking place in the history of the Traveler universe. There are six short one hour and half sessions that are tied together into a grander narrative. You can take part in just one, some or all of them. Approximate starting hours are :12:00, 14:00, 16:00 (one hour lunch break 18:00-19:00) 19:00, 21:00 and 23:00. After each adventure concludes, there is about half an hour of more strategic game where we will see how the conflict between Earth and the Grand empire proceeds.

More information can be found at wiki: https://tyrma.net/cwiki/index.php/Interstellar_wars

cachedAnnotations.konsti:rpgSystem: Powered by Apocalypse with ideas from Traveler
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: Main language will be English, and Finnish is used for the language of the empire (since no one wants to learn a new constructed language for a game) 12 hours in total (0r 13 with an one hour lunch break) and six sessions. First three are fairly pre determined, rest depend on what the players decide to do on the "big map" strategic game.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Violence, War, Extremist political movements, absolute emptiness of interstellar void.

title: Introducing Tabletop Role Playing Games to new players: A Tutorial
description:
This is an immersive workshop aiming for a minimum viable tabletop RPG experience - with plenty of space for reflection and Q&A. We will explore the fundamentals of tabletop roleplaying games that are common to most if not all different game systems including things like theater of the mind, being a character, unneccesary obstacles, random chance and collaborative storytelling.

We will use a simple framework for introducing TTRPGs to new players, your grandmother or strangers on the street (remember consent). In addition to new players, it is also suitable game masters and not-yet-gamemasters who are looking for tools for their Session 0, want to get back to basics or want to introduce the fundamentals without needing people to commit to a longer session.

Sign-up for this workshop is in Konsti. Sign-up begins on Saturday at 11AM and 6PM.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: A chance for a RPG introduction in a small group away from the noisy halls. Using RPG safety tools for running the workshop itself to minimize discomfort.

title: Lost in a mine
description:
Everyone thought it was a good idea to sneak and break into the local mines to celebrate the beginning of summer vacation. They found stairs down, and some sort of break spot where they settled to party through the night. 
Then their lights started going out one by one. As they did not want to be trapped in, they tried to find the stairs but strangely those weren't there anymore.
Slowly the light are going dark, one by one. What waits in the darkness and can they get out?
 

10 candles is a system which is strongly based on shared storytelling and which is scheduled by the candles whose extinguishing advances the game. This is an unwinnable game where all characters are forced to succumb to the darkness. However, the goal in the game is to hold on to the hope that the characters have for as long as possible and thus tell a meaningful story together.

You don't need to know the system, and all you need is an open mind and a desire to tell this story together.

IN ENGLISH:
Residents of Kielom√§ki have ventured out into a new world: excotic Fuengirola. Our entourage have left for a day trip to Colomares Castle, but their bus blew a tire and they are now stranded in a local gas station. Will the jolly atmosphere of the group survive this sudden change of scenery from historical sights to cheap garage coffee?

Kielo-Tours: Fuengirola is a feel good larp whose characters range from teenagers to grannies. Half of the characters are native Finns and half are native Spaniards, but all of them speak English (somewhat, at least). The profiles of the Finnish characters are provided in Finnish, and the profiles of the Spanish characters are provided in English.

---

Warhammer Kill Team is a fast-paced skirmish style miniature wargame, where players compete on the battlefields of a dark future. 

The Kill Team Corner offers a place to play on every day of the convention. No need to commit to long tournaments; just pop by to play a game or two when it suits you best. You can play with a friend on a ready-made game table, or look for new people to play with. You can also look for people to play with on the Discord server managed by the programme organizers (https://discord.gg/N3QyqVhXtk).

In case you haven't brought your own, there is a limited amount of miniatures and other equipment available for players to borrow.

title: Knightly swordplay for writers and GMs
description:
Ever wondered how heavy a bastard sword is? Is it hard to plan swordfights or write about your ranger or knight character actually fencing? Do you struggle with making swordplay scenes come alive? Wonder no longer!
In this workshop we'll pick up weapons and find out what it really feels like to hit a target with a sword, how to use your body in a fight with or without weapons, how to read an opponent, what constitutes skill with a sword - and of course have enormous fun with pointy objects! 
This is a physical class, so wear comfortable exercise clothes, and expect to sweat a little. Indoor shoes, with thin soles if possible, are recommended. Absolutely no physical requirements, everyone is welcome regardless of age, fitness, size, experience or disability. We want to teach you how to fight, which you can then use in your writing.
If you're under 18 years old, please bring an adult. 
We can switch between English and Finnish as needed.

Sign-up for this workshop is at the Experience Point.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther:
This would be a challenging workshop if you are severely vision impaired, but it's still possible to participate to the extent you wish and to which it's safe.
If you are hearing impaired, please ensure you are able to understand at least the safety guidance word for word (e.g., sign language interpretation).
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings:
Touching others - can opt out.
Wearing a fencing mask.
Discussion of body size and shape may trigger body anxiety, although we genuinely think that all bodies deserve a chance to learn to fence if they so choose, and that body size is never a downside in combat.

Experience point offers low-threshold board, card, and tabletop role-playing games. Guided games are available for many different preferences, and you can join the games alone or with a larger group. title: Lockpicking Workshop for Beginners
description:
All that is between you and the content of the treasure chest is a padlock.

Lock-picking is the practice of unlocking a lock by manipulating the components of the lock device without the original key.
The workshop will teach the basic methods of lock-picking and lock bypassing. The arranger will provide practice pin tumbler locks and borrow lock picks for all workshop participants. The workshop will include history and a brief introduction to different lock types and pick methods. Most of the workshop time will be spent practicing lock-picking together with the instructor. Lock-picking requires fine motor skills and use of both hands. The workshop is the same as last year, however hopefully the presentation has slightly improved.

Note: Although lock-picking can be associated with criminal intent, it is an essential skill for the legitimate profession of locksmithing, and is also pursued by law-abiding citizens as a useful skill to learn, or simply as a hobby (locksport).

Sign-up for this workshop is in Konsti. Sign-up begins on Friday at 3PM.

The Sorcerous realm has imprisoned and sentenced you and three others to the Maze of Frustrations. It is not that you are innocent, you definitely did what they accuse you of. The problem lies in that everyone sent to this accursed maze have returned from it within a few hours all emaciated and some even dead. Many of the survivors will die within a few weeks from release. title: Memories of Necromunda - narrative mini-campaign
description:
Memories of Necromunda is a chained narrative mini-campaign for 6-8 players, where gangs investigate a string of disappearances in a semi co-op style. You are taken from the container terminal of Ashgrad out into the harsh wastes and even below the ashen dunes before you can hope to resolve this plot.

Ashgrad is a settlement near the Dustwall. It‚Äôs a lucrative base of operations for those seeking buried ruins. Many opportunistic gangs make their way here, but few survive.

A year ago, the arrival of the disgraced Magos Biologis Cassandra Vi triggered a settlement-wide gang war. The Goliath gang known as the Ashen Inheritors, allied with Cassandra, made a play for control of Ashgrad. Eventually, they were defeated and driven into the wastes.

Now, a year later, members of the very same gangs that crushed the uprising have begun to disappear. Whispers in Ashgrad speak of Ramcyc, the Ashen Inheritors‚Äô brutal leader, as the mastermind behind the abductions.

Rumours claim their ambition is connected to the Goliath practice of data-slug transference of gang legacy, that they now seek to expand this practice in some way. Some say they plan to steal the genetic legacy of all great players in Necromunda.

And they are starting with your crew.

Friday
Scenario 1: Ashgrad Terminal. The container yard of Ashgrad is ruled by goliath weapon manufacturers, some of them ex-members of the Ashen Inheritors. Press them for information, steal weapons and climb the crane.

Saturday
Scenario 2: The Rustyard and Midnight‚Äôs Den. Crews track down different informants as players divide for two smaller scale skirmishes. Just outside Ashgrad is the rusted remnants of a railyard where outcast supporters of Ramcyc make their home. The Midnight‚Äôs Den is a data archive controlled by Delaque gang the Cipher Serpents. Strike at them and extract the information you need.  

Scenario 3: The Hunt for <redacted>. The crews mount up and go into the wastes. Vehicular action in the ash wastes as you fend off strange mutants and locate the next part of the puzzle. 

Sunday
Scenario 4: Vestigia Memoriae. Venture beneath the ashen sands.

Experience with Necromunda is required as well as a painted starting gang of 1000 credits + 400 credits of vehicles/mounts. Your entire crew need to be either mounted or fit on a vehicle transport. Additionally, you need a model for your captured ganger. It should be an unarmed ganger model that you pay no credits for. 
We‚Äôre emphasizing interesting gang themes, cool conversions, and cohesive paint jobs that help tell your gang‚Äôs story. Make your crew memorable‚Äînot just in how they fight, but in how they look.

title: Metsien viimeinen huuto / The last cry of the forest
description:
‚ÄúTaas pit√§√§ muuttaa syvemm√§lle mets√§√§n‚Ä¶Sent√§√§n meid√§n mailta l√∂ytyv√§√§ ihmisten teknologiaromua voi yhdist√§√§ meid√§n taikaan, mutta onko sit√§ pakko tuottaa niin valtavasti ja sen lis√§ksi heitt√§√§ luontoon!? Eik√∂ riit√§, ett√§ meit√§ jatkuvasti ajetaan ahtaammalle‚Ä¶Sota on jatkunut jo liian pitk√§√§n, ja ihmisten istuttamat uudet, taiattomat mets√§t ovat laiha lohtu kaiken menett√§m√§mme edess√§.‚Äù

Peli sijoittuu meid√§n maailmamme rinnakkaistodellisuuteen, jossa keijujen ja ihmisten v√§linen sodank√§ynti on jatkunut jo teollisesta vallankumouksesta asti. Nyt sodassa ollaan saavutettu kiehumispiste, eik√§ ihmisten kanssa yhteiselo ole en√§√§ vaihtoehto.
Kes√§n ja Talven hovit kohtaavat toimistorakennuksessa tekem√§√§n t√§rkeit√§ p√§√§t√∂ksi√§ sodan kulusta - hy√∂k√§t√§kk√∂ vaiko per√§√§nty√§?

Peliss√§ keskipisteess√§ ovat neuvottelu ja tiukan tilanteen k√§rjist√§m√§ ihmiskeijusuhdedraama. Tarkoitus ei kuitenkaan ole keskitty√§ sotataktiikoihin/l√∂yt√§m√§√§n ‚Äúoikeaa‚Äù ratkaisua siihen miten sota voitetaan, vaan tilanteen draamaan ja siihen, ett√§ p√§√§dyt√§√§n yhdess√§ johonkin ratkaisuun.

Peli pelautettiin ensimm√§isen kerran Ropeconissa 2024.

Teemoja: sota, ilmastokatastrofi, ihmissuhdedraama, neuvottelu/konflikti, yhteis√∂llisyys, yst√§vyys, underdog meininki

‚ÄúAgain, we are forced to move deeper into the forest‚Ä¶ At least we can combine all this human technological debris with our magic, but is it really necessary to make so much of it and toss it out into nature on top of everything!? Isn‚Äôt it enough that we are constantly being pushed into a corner‚Ä¶ The war has been going on for too long, and all the new forest that the humans have planted is devoid of magic, so it‚Äôs a cold comfort in the face of all that we have lost.‚Äù

The game is set in a parallel reality of our world, where the ongoing conflict between fairies and humans has persisted since the industrial revolution. Now, the war has reached a boiling point, and coexistence with humans is no longer an option. 
The Summer and Winter courts convene in an office building to make crucial decisions about the war - whether to attack or to retreat?

The focus of the game lies in negotiation and interpersonal drama heightened by the tense situation. 
The goal is not to concentrate on war tactics/finding the ‚Äúright‚Äù solution to winning the war, but rather on the drama of the situation and on coming to a resolution together.

The larp had its first two runs at Ropecon 2024.

Themes: war, climate disaster, negotiation/conflict, community, friendship, underdog vibes

title: Millenium's End - Northern Shadows
description:
Millennium‚Äôs End ‚Äì Game Synopsis
*Millennium‚Äôs End* is a tactical role-playing game set in a world of espionage, paramilitary operations, and counterterrorism. Players take on the roles of elite operatives working for BlackEagle/BlackEagle Security, a private military company specializing in high-risk covert missions. Founded in 1998, BlackEagle/BlackEagle has grown into one of the most sought-after security firms in the world, operating in conflict zones and politically unstable regions.  

The game emphasizes realism with a detailed skill system, advanced firearms mechanics, and strategic mission planning. A signature feature is the use of transparent overlays to determine shot placement in combat, making firefights highly tactical. The setting blends real-world geopolitical tensions with clandestine operations, allowing players to engage in corporate espionage, hostage rescues, and counterinsurgency missions across the globe.  

Northern Shadows ‚Äì Adventure Synopsis
The year is 2025. *Northern Shadows* follows the first permanently stationed BlackEagle/BlackEagle team in Helsinki. Though the company has maintained an office in Finland for two years, it has operated only through local contacts and temporary assignments‚Äîuntil now. This newly assembled unit has been deployed to establish a firm presence in the region, but their first mission will serve as both a test and a potential turning point for BlackEagle/BlackEagle‚Äôs Nordic operations.  

Their task: track down and neutralize Major Erik ‚ÄúTower‚Äù Von Sydow, a rogue NATO logistics officer believed to be orchestrating an illegal arms deal involving experimental EMP technology. Intelligence suggests he is operating within Finland‚Äôs criminal underworld, leveraging contacts in the arms trade and mercenary networks.  

As the first dedicated BlackEagle/BlackEagle unit in Finland, the team must prove themselves not only to their employer but also to each other. If they fail, it won‚Äôt just mean mission failure‚Äîit could mean the collapse of BlackEagle/BlackEagle‚Äôs presence in the region. Their success, or failure, will be written in the *Northern Shadows*.  

---  

Millennium‚Äôs End ‚Äì Pelin synopsis 
*Millennium‚Äôs End* on taktinen roolipeli, joka sijoittuu vakoilun, paramilitaaristen operaatioiden ja terrorismin vastaisen toiminnan maailmaan. Pelaajat astuvat BlackEagle/BlackEagle Securityn eliittiyksik√∂n operatiivisten agenttien rooleihin, suorittaen korkean riskin salaisia teht√§vi√§ eri puolilla maailmaa. Perustamisestaan vuonna 1998 l√§htien BlackEagle/BlackEagle on kasvanut yhdeksi maailman arvostetuimmista yksityisist√§ turvallisuusyrityksist√§, toimien konfliktialueilla ja poliittisesti ep√§vakailla alueilla.  

Peli painottaa realismia yksityiskohtaisella taitoj√§rjestelm√§ll√§√§n, kehittyneill√§ asej√§rjestelmill√§√§n ja strategisella teht√§v√§suunnittelulla. Pelin erikoisominaisuutena on l√§pin√§kyvien t√§ht√§inmatriisien k√§ytt√∂, jotka tekev√§t taistelutilanteista entist√§ realistisempia ja taktisesti haastavampia. Kampanjat sijoittuvat todellisiin geopoliittisiin j√§nnitteisiin, joissa pelaajat joutuvat suorittamaan soluttautumisoperaatioita, panttivankipelastuksia ja vastavakoiluteht√§vi√§.  

Pohjoisen Varjot ‚Äì Seikkailun synopsis
Vuosi on 2025. *Northern Shadows* seuraa BlackEagle/BlackEaglen ensimm√§ist√§ pysyv√§sti Helsinkiin sijoitettua operatiivista ryhm√§√§. Vaikka yrityksell√§ on ollut toimisto Suomessa jo kahden vuoden ajan, t√§h√§n asti se on toiminut ainoastaan paikallisten kontaktien ja tilap√§isten operaatioiden varassa. Nyt t√§m√§ t√§ysin uusi tiimi on koottu ja l√§hetetty kent√§lle ‚Äì heid√§n ensimm√§inen teht√§v√§ns√§ toimii samalla tulikokeena, jossa heid√§n kykyns√§ toimia yhdess√§ testataan v√§litt√∂m√§sti.  

Tiimi saa teht√§v√§kseen j√§ljitt√§√§ ja eliminoida Major Erik ‚ÄúTorni‚Äù Von Sydow, Naton logistiikkaupseeri, joka on kadonnut ja ep√§ill√§√§n olevan vastuussa laittoman EMP-teknologiaan liittyv√§n asekaupan j√§rjest√§misest√§. Tiedustelutiedot viittaavat siihen, ett√§ Von Sydow toimii Suomen j√§rjest√§ytyneen rikollisuuden parissa ja hy√∂dynt√§√§ entisi√§ sotilaskontaktejaan saadakseen tukea ase- ja palkkasoturiverkostoista.  

Ensimm√§isen√§ BlackEagle/BlackEaglen pysyv√§n√§ yksikk√∂n√§ Suomessa tiimin on todistettava arvonsa sek√§ ty√∂nantajalleen ett√§ toisilleen. Ep√§onnistuminen ei tarkoita pelk√§st√§√§n teht√§v√§n ep√§onnistumista ‚Äì se voi my√∂s romahduttaa BlackEagle/BlackEaglen aseman Pohjoismaissa. This tournament is beginner-friendly: if you took part in the Moonstone demo, you are welcome to play in the tournament. If you don't have a team, we will lend you one.

The first and second Nerdic Open Mic were phenomenal successes, so here we go again, continuing the great tradition started by Jukka "Solmu" Fred (n√©e Salonen). title: Night of the Were-Tigers - Funnel World - Level Zero Adventure with a Qihuan/Wuxia Flavor
description:
You've always lived in a lovely, peaceful town between a river and a mountain. Ghosts and demons hunt outside the town walls at night, but so far, they haven't been a big problem. Your town, like every town, has guards. The provincial capital is just a daytrip away.
Heroes sometimes pass through in their armors and magical capes, but you're not one of those folks. You're villagers. Life is good.

Until one night, when a pack of were-tigers attacks the town. They eat the guards. They want to turn your town into a snack station for local monsters.

Someone needs to do something, and you are that someone, even if you don't have any real adventuring talents, magic weapons, or proper kong-fu training. You have pitchforks, torches, wheelbarrows, eggs, and frying pans. Maybe you can recognize some herbs, write a little, or carry a tray filled with teacups.

You, a band of simple villagers, need to get out, survive the perilous overnight trip to the provincial capital where the Emperor's troops and several heroes are stationed, and get help before it's too late. Or you can try to figure out another way to deal with the were-tigers. The main point is, you don't want monsters to eat everyone you love.

Any characters who survive the adventure become level 1 characters, ready to be brought to other games. Which class they gain depends on what they did during this adventure. If they survive.

System: Powered by the Apocalypse Engine (PBTA), Funnel World. Very easy to understand, no complex math required.
What is Funnel World?
"A Funnel is an adventure in which the player-characters start as a motley crew of ordinary villagers who find themselves in extraordinary circumstances; common folk thrown into a crucible of death and terror, who struggle merely to come out the other end in one piece. Many, and sometimes all of these poor souls die horrible deaths over the course of a Funnel adventure, but those lucky enough to survive are transformed by the extremity of their experience." (From Funnel World description)

You get two or three level zero characters to play, so if one dies, your game can still continue. The characters are statted and ready to go when the game starts, but not otherwise very strictly defined so you can make them yours, or even bring in your (un-powered) OCs and slot them on the premade character templates. PCs may and probably will die, so while OCs are welcome, please only bring in those whose sudden death will not send you into a sadness spiral. 

Feel free to bring your own dice.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther:
The game is by default in English, but if all the players are Finnish speakers the GM will speak Finnish. However, if there is a non-Finnish speaker, the expectation is that the game table is all English.

Your English doesn't have to be perfect or completely fluent to join in! As long as you're able to express yourself and understand most of what's being said, e.g. your English grade is 8 or higher, or you've played a coop video game online in English, or you could manage your way abroad, feel free to join in! The GM has a lot of experience mediating multilingual English-as-a-foreign-language spaces.
The GM expects understanding and grace for any language mistakes at the table.

The game requires spoken communication and the game system is fairly fast paced.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings:
The game has mild violence typical of PBTA games, battles, and monsters. 
PC and NPC characters may express negative opinions that do not represent GM or player opinions or views. 
The game deals with a monster invasion and potential destruction of the PC's hometown and the threat of monstrous annihilation, so while the description is on the level of Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter or other teen/YA literature, it may still cause anxiety.
PC characters are extremely weak and fragile, and players are expected to think about how they approach potential conflict situations. PC characters are likely to die.
Contains monsters and other content from Chinese mythology, possible spiders, snakes, grime and dirt, mild descriptions of violence (tabletop RPG typical). Any romance content is Disney level at most, and we are rainbow inclusive at the table. However, romance or identity is not the focus.

scheduleItems.title: Night of the Were-Tigers - Funnel World - Level Zero Adventure with a Qihuan/Wuxia Flavor

title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #5-17: Stranded on Yesterday's Tide [ENG]
description:
A Pathfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 4th-level characters.

The Pathfinder Society has heard reports of a ship sighted over and over, apparently following the same path before vanishing each week. This unfortunate ship is stuck in time, repeating the same week over and over. The crew has tried everything to escape this fate, and gave up years of the same week ago. The PCs must find a way to return things to normal and save the crew from an eternity of this single week.

Written by William Fischer

Bring your own Pathfinder Society character between levels 1 and 4, or use a pre-made character.

title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-18: Symposium on a Fallen God / Kuolleen jumalan Symposiumi
description:
A Pathfinder Society Scenario designed for 3rd- through 6th-level characters.

Taldor responded to the Godsrain, the death of the war god Gorum, with an attempt to draw in the finest minds in magical study. They've invited scholars from across Golarion to attend a symposium on the Godsrain and the warshards, pieces of Gorum fallen from the sky, and the Pathfinder Society has decided to present their findings from some unique warshards they recovered in hopes of gaining insight from others across the world. The Aspis Consortium, though, finds this an excellent opportunity to gain valuables in the theft of research materials, and to harm the Pathfinders by framing them for the theft. The Pathfinders must deal with the Aspis and clear their names lest they leave the symposium not with new knowledge but with a reputation dragged through the mud.

title: Pushing the Speed of Light
description:
Space! It is vast. You are a crewmember on a big ship, hauling cargo to a hundred suns. Each trip takes years, but only weeks pass for you, thanks to the quirks of the theory of relativity. At each port, a new adventure awaits; in between, generations pass, societies change, and nations rise and fall. Why did you leave your old life behind, and will you ever find your place in the universe?

The game is played in scenarios that last from 30 minutes to 1 hour. Players are free to join and leave at any time.

title: Risk Factor
description:
Vuonna 1990 ihmiskunta ottaa askeleen kohti uusia maailmoja. Hyppymoottorin keksiminen avaa kahden suurvallan avaruuskilpailulle uuden vaiheen.

In the year 1990 humanity takes the next step towards new worlds. The invention of the jump drive opens a new stage in the space race between the two superpowers. 

The game is a a space adventure in an alternate history run on modified Mongoose Traveller (2nd e.d). The characters are brave astro/cosmonauts in the vast emptiness far away from home. The game consists of short (ca. 1 h) risk sessions filled with risks that test the characters mettle and skills.

title: Rogues and Raiders in a Cursed World / Konnia ja kaappareita kirotussa maailmassa
description:
After ravaging the Ravenland for generations, The Blood Mist has suddenly and unexplainedly vanished. You‚Äôve grown up in a reality whose borders have barely extended beyond the immediate vicinity of your home village and the safety of its sturdy stockade. The rest of the world has existed to you only in stories. When The Blood Mist was still around, only the foolhardiest people would risk travelling beyond their villages. The Mist would claim those who weren‚Äôt safe and sound in their homes by nightfall. Many are still anxious to leave their homes, but you are among the ones who for different reasons can‚Äôt wait to abandon the safety of the all too familiar walls. Perhaps you must see what is beyond the horizon, to learn if the myths are true, to take back what was lost generations ago, or to rob the treasures which have been abandoned and are up for grabs?

This role-playing game is what is referred to as a sandbox game, i.e. a game where you‚Äôre not walking on a set path, following a predetermined story by the gamemaster, but rather finding your own paths and reacting to a world which reacts to you in turn. The world is open for you to explore, as it‚Äôs just as unknown and new to you as it‚Äôs to your characters.

All the game materials are in English, and the common language in the table will be English if there‚Äôs even one non-Finnish speaking player present.

You‚Äôll have a selection of pre-made characters for you to customise and choose from. If the player amount and time permits, you can also create your own character using a quick dice generation system.

Content will be adjusted so that everyone is comfortable and able to have fun in the table.


Tuotuaan kuolemaa Korpinmaahan sukupolvien ajan, Veriutu on yht√§kki√§ ja selitt√§m√§tt√§ haihtunut. Olet kasvanut aikuiseksi todellisuudessa, joka on rajoittunut kotikyl√§si l√§hiymp√§rist√∂√∂n ja kyl√§n tukevan paaluaidan suojiin. Ulkomaailma on ollut sinulle olemassa ainoastaan tarinoissa. Veriudun vallitessa ainoastaan hullunrohkeimmat ottivat riskin ja matkasivat kotikyliens√§ ulkopuolelle. Veriutu nieli he, jotka eiv√§t olleet turvassa kotonaan pime√§n tultua. Moni ei viel√§k√§√§n uskalla l√§hte√§ kodeistaan, mutta sin√§ olet yksi niist√§, jotka syyst√§ tai toisesta eiv√§t malta olla j√§tt√§m√§tt√§ aivan liian tutun kotikyl√§n paaluaitojen turvaa taakseen. Ehk√§ sinun t√§ytyy n√§hd√§ mit√§ horisontin takana oikein on, saada selville ovatko myytit totta, ottaa takaisin jotakin joka menetettiin jo sukupolvia sitten, tai ry√∂v√§t√§ hyl√§ttyj√§ aarteita, jotka vain odottavat ottajaansa?

T√§m√§ peli on ns. hiekkalaatikkoroolipeli eli pelaajina ette seuraa pelinjohtajan etuk√§teen m√§√§rittelem√§√§ reitti√§ ja valmista tarinaa, vaan reitit p√§√§t√§tte te pelaajat, reagoiden el√§v√§√§n maailmaan, joka yht√§ lailla reagoi teihin. Maailma on vapaasti tutkittavana ja se on hahmoillenne yht√§ vieras ja uusi kuin teillekin.

Materiaalit ovat englanniksi, mutta pelinjohtaja auttaa tarvittaessa suomennosten kanssa. Peli pelataan englanniksi, jos pelaajien joukossa on suomea osaamattomia.

Pelaajille on tarjolla valmishahmoja, joita voi muokata omansalaiseksi. Oman hahmon luominen t√§ysin alusta k√§ytt√§en nopeaa noppageneraattoria on my√∂s mahdollista, mik√§li pelaajam√§√§r√§ ja aikataulu antaa my√∂ten.

Sis√§lt√∂√§ muokataan siten, ett√§ jokaisella on mukava olla ja hauskaa p√∂yd√§ss√§.

title: Human Interaction as a Designable Surface
description:
This is a reflective talk about larp festivals and design for participation. The EU-funded research project Larpocracy started at the beginning of the year. One of the key areas of research in the project is approaching the social human encounter as a designable surface. Our part of the project will study festivals, conventions, and other larp-adjacent spaces to explore how our community designs for participation. What are some values, habits, reflexes, traditions, and design practices that larpers take for granted, but that we might reflect on, refine, and share?

Our project aims to produce theoretical models and practical tools that can help the larp community make our meeting spaces even better ‚Äì and help other communities to design human experiences with greater intention. The program should suit especially people who organize larp festivals and conventions.

title: Daggerheart: Spirits of Dawnhollow
description:
A daggerheart one-shot. Takes place in a non-established setting inspired by daggerheart's one-shot prompts.  
Premade character templates with room for customization. Includes introduction to the basics of the Daggerheart system.

In the center of the kingdom of Atheira, there is a graveyard of forgotten gods. A group of adventurers have recently arrived to the nearby village of Dawnhollow, where all kinds of natural spirits live among the common folk.
After an unusual storm, something is wrong. Both villagers and spirits are missing and an evil forgotten one seems to be gathering power.
You, being adventurers and all, have been asked to go to the graveyard in order to rescue the missing villagers, return the spirits and save the day!

title: Starfinder Playtest Scenario #1: Shards of the Glass Planet
description:
A Starfinder Second Edition Playtest adventure designed for 1st-level characters.

For millennia, Birnam‚Äôs Bubble has been a planet untouched by outsiders, fully encapsulated in an impenetrable shield of unknown energy and protected by powerful automated defenses. Through this barrier, explorers and surveyors have glimpsed pristine settlements, verdant flora, and inexplicable magical emanations‚Äîyet no fauna or citizens populate the world‚Äôs surface.

As in many other parts of the galaxy, the Drift Crisis changed everything. Now, the energy barrier surrounding Birnam‚Äôs Bubble cracks like shattering glass, and shards of this solidified energy have begun to fall through the atmosphere to the planet‚Äôs surface, causing significant destruction. Enter the breach and uncover the secrets of the lost civilizations of Birnam‚Äôs Bubble before they're lost forever!

Bring your own level 1 Starfinder 2nd Edition character, or use a pre-made character.

title: Still a Staple - Defiant. Redundant. Legendary.
description:
For two centuries, StapleForge Unlimited has valiantly stood the test of time ‚Äî but the end is drawing near.

In a galaxy where everything is handled digitally, employees work remotely, and suits and pencil skirts have been replaced by more expressive fashion choices, the great-grandson of the company‚Äôs founder, John Brasswick, fears that the legendary tale of StapleForge is drawing to a close.

At StapleForge, tradition has always been the cornerstone. But when the only remaining orders for paperclips come from niche jewelry designers making ironic nostalgia earrings, it‚Äôs time to act.

At the request of her aging father, Dr. Adelaide Brasswick, Vice President of Strategic Relevance, has summoned a mandatory company meeting with one clear goal:

To make the company‚Äôs traditional products fashionable and relevant again ‚Äî by any means necessary. 

Can a new world be forced to kneel in front of tradition - or is it time for tradition to fade away? Is evolution possible for the tradition-bound executive board.

Gameplay
The game consists of a single meeting, during which characters are divided into teams. Each team‚Äôs goal is to engage in a brainstorming session to generate creative, bold, and preferably not entirely ridiculous ideas on how to make classic office supplies fashionable and relevant again. StapleForge Limited has traditionally rewarded its best workers and this fine tradition will continue in this meeting. These rewards will be handed to the best participants:

In-Game Awards (Presented by Brasswick HR‚Ñ¢ or the CEO Themself):

Most Marketable Clip
For the team that managed to rebrand a paperclip as the next galactic must-have.

The Synergy Star
For the team that displayed the most ‚Äúcollaborative buzzword compliance.‚Äù

Best Performance Under Meaningless Pressure
For keeping a straight face while pitching ‚ÄúBinder Drones for Home Defense.‚Äù

The Brasswick Legacy Prize
Awarded to the product idea that most honors the company‚Äôs rich and dusty heritage. (Even if it's terrible.)

The Internal Threat Award
Secretly handed to the rebel who caused the most subtle disruption without being discovered.
Yes, there are rebels. Who doesn't love rebels?

The game will last for three hours, with a short break in the middle.

4 days ago, three village youth went camping to prove their courage during a midsummer festival. They did not return. The village of Tannic needs brave souls who dare to venture into the haunted forest and bring the young people safely home.

Tannic is a love letter to pine barrens, youthful adventures, and campfire stories. The game system is the rules-lite Cairn 2e. Expect forest exploration and classic dungeon crawling.

title: Tattoo of the Hydra, Vampires in New York
description:
Life isn‚Äôt easy in New York in the year 2095 . Being a vampire would be hard enough, but between a turbid political landscape, fighting against the second inquisition, and now Pentex, it‚Äôs hard to know what is the step that will keep you alive, or what step will lead to final death. But then again, nothing has changed I suppose. I‚Äôve lived long enough now to have seen my fair share of empires, gods, and sciences, all vying for control in their ‚ÄúJyhad‚Äù. But for all the ploys humans play, the machinations of the kindred remain eternally a league above the kine. Of course, we have to adapt, and indeed our lives as kindred approaching the turn of the century are fraught with novel challenges. AI, cybernetics, Light-based weaponry has all proven to be exceedingly difficult to adapt to for many of our ancients. Regardless, whatever the century, we survive, the brood of Caine some call us, others a disease upon humanity, even fewer still call us divine intercessors on the affairs of mortals. I however, know only one word that has truly been able to define us for all of our history, we are Vampire. And even now, the masquerade stands. 

Join me, Kalyan Ghadiyaram as we weave a tale of four Kindred in a Cyberpunk version of New York. You are neonates freshly born who have in your midst a blood heritage that has made you the prime target for a series of key players in this Sci-fi AU of Vampire the Masquerade. Learn to hunt the mortals using new gadgetry, fight against the oncoming second-inquisition, using your wits, intellect and fangs to carve out a few measly hours before the sunlight breaks.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: The game can be played entirely using online tools, and characters will be premade. Rule-heavy mechanics are easily simplified in VTM and we will make use of a veil system to ensure player safety. We will also make use of a break every 1 1/2 hours to allow players to unwind and socialize!

title: Teenage monsters with great love
description:
Player characters are teens who try to survive their tangled relationships while their secret, mystical, magical and at times even monstrous side causes additional issues. The game delves into the confusion and horror of teenagerhood using literal monsters as allegories for the issues of the characters.

The game may contain sexual themes and digging of different teenage traumas, and is not recommended for players who might find that distressing.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Violence

title: The Court of Eternal Hearts
description:
The Court of Eternal Hearts

For the first time in a thousand years, an union of Men and Elves is about to be celebrated. Princess Verana of the High Realm is the progeny of the blood of the Nine Daughters, giving her magical powers and the ability to resist the supernatural charms of the Elvinkind. She and her retinue of dearest friends and most trusted servants - all picked for their unparalled abilities - is to arrive soon in the foreign and mysterious Elven land of del'Phalia, the first humans to do so in centuries, to marry the Elven Goddess-Empress' nephew, the Prince of Thorns, Eldan Starborn. As if learning the alien ways of the Elves and their inhumanly strange culture and navigating the web of love, lies and lust they are tangled in was not enough, an unexpected calamity is about to tremble the society of the Eternal Ones to their core.  

Will the Princess get her happily ever after with the Elven Prince, or get swept off her feet by a romantic rival? Will her escorts find love and comfort amid the beautiful but deceptive Elves? 

A romantic fantasy, court-intrigue and mystery adventure with some romantasy influences. Light on rules, heavy on story and characters. Contains adult themes, but any explicit or intimate scenes will be strictly "off-camera" (i.e. not played or described in detail). 

Played in either Finnish or English, depending on the participants' preference/language proficiency.

title: The Disappearance of Princess Nymera
description:
Welcome to Aurelia Academy, the prestigious magical school with a deep history - and troubles brewing under the surface. Recently the top student of the academy, the crown heir of the realm, Princess Nymera went missing - and it clearly has something to do with the school and its mysterious past... but for some reason, nobody's looking into the school! It's the crown heir that's missing, for Merlin's sake! Grab your wands, gang; we have a princess to find, and potentially, to save.

The players play as a rag-tag group of students and faculty utilising the Kids on Brooms -system in a homebrew world inspired by magical school settings. The players will have a selection of pre-made characters to choose from. Depending on the players' experience, there is also a possibility for character creation.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Triggering topics: Discussions about fascistic policies and politics, magical racism, potential mild bodyhorror

title: The Endless Path
description:
The road is a circle and we must walk it. So say the navigators who lead the Great Caravans that loop around the world. Every walker of the Endless Path has their part to play in the daily life of the Great Caravan-- artisans, guards, cleaners, healers, herders, farmers, and more-- but what happens when the Caravan stops? With no news from the front, a unlikely band of travelers is assembled to journey up the Caravan and find out why they've stopped moving, but the path is long and unknown. Together they will face hardships and discoveries, learn more about the world they walk, and perhaps uncover a secret long buried on the dusty road. 

A rules-light homebrew game about culture, community, travel, and change. Pre-made characters will be available, but original characters are also welcome. The initial setting of the story will be determined by players before play.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: Materials will be provided in a dyslexia friendly font and all written material will have an audio alternative.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Cultural differences,  potential claustrophobia, brief and respectful discussion of death and grieving

title: The Heatherfield Ball (D&D 5e)
description:
It is a truth universally acknowledged that a princess in hiding must be in want of a dance. Years ago, in a time of danger, young Princess Ella was hidden in the village of Heatherfield, transformed by an enchantment so powerful that even she does not remember who she really is. The only thing that the enchantment could not change was her love of dancing. Now that the kingdom is safe, it's your job to find the princess by holding the most fabulous ball Heatherfield has ever seen!
A madcap role-playing frolic for level 3 characters. Little or no combat. Bring your own pre-made character (any officially published sources; please have your character ready before the start of the game) or choose from characters created by the GM.
Played in English.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Family problems, involuntary transformation

title: The Kids Are Not Alright
description: The Kids Are Not Alright is a larp about troubled children. One half of the players play kids who communicate mainly by drawing disturbed images and the other half child psychologists who try to understand them. The game proceeds in a very structured manner and is beginner-friendly. The game leans heavily on horror movies (eg. Sixth Sense) but includes also themes of social realism and psychological realism. All kinds of nasty things that happen to kids in real life and in fantasy may be introduced.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: The game leans almost completely on ability to see.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: All kinds of nasty things that can happen to children. Social and health service cuts. Horror movie tropes.

title: The Last Spin
description:
