title: The Last Spin
description:
The conflict between your gangs has finally gone too far and you don't want to suffer more losses than necessary. One member from each side, one gun, one death. After one game of Russian Roulette the gang of the loser would leave the city for good. At least that is what was agreed.

The Last Spin is an intensive 1 hour larp for two players. It focuses on the interaction between the two player characters and the dark atmosphere of the situation. Before the game the players take part in character creation, guided by a set of prewritten questions and some randomness. During the game the decisions of the players and the randomness of a deck of cards representing the gun work together to create a unique narrative for each run.

This run is played in English by default, but the players can agree to play in any language. Instructions are given in either Finnish or English. There is also a run played in Finnish by default. You can sign up alone or with a pair. The larp can be run even if all the spots are not filled.

The inspiration for the game comes from a short story of the same name by Evan Hunter.

Pelist√§ on tarjolla my√∂s suomenkielinen pelautus

title: The mad hatter‚Äôs Tea Party
description:
Come join Mad Hatter and their friends on an unforgettable journey trough teas and dimensions! Follow a white rabbit into the mad hater¬¥s tea world we will be brew something good for you. 

You have been selected as your character (fictional, historical, otherwise whimsical or one provided by us) to attend the Mad Hatters tea party in a pocket dimension between world and outside of time with delicious treats (feel welcome to bring your own and even share if you feel like it) and scrumptious conversations. 

Think of this event as an interactive play where you can chose to interact as part of the play or take a set back enjoy the liquid tea and/or verbal tea. 

The main language is English, but you can also speak Finnish, Swedish or French and be understood by the game organizers.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:accessibilityOther: People can choose to participate more or choose to be more passive throughout the game. There is no requirement to interact all the time.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: We do not know what kind of backstories  characters will come with but we expect cultural differences both from this world or others, we invite everyone to be open minded and accepting of each others cultures in a pluralistic mindset.
cachedAnnotations.ropecon:otherAuthor: Alex Zephira Powe-Ignatius and Bea "Bee" Gran

title: The Secret Lives of Familiars
description:
You are familiars, that essential part of any dynamic wizarding duo. You all live in the wizards' tower. As a familiar, your typical day consists of magic, tummy rubs, and snacks. And knocking over the occasional alchemical experiment, because you must make a contribution to the work of wizarding. Your wizards have been on adventures before, but they are currently strangely overdue returning from their latest escapade.

Some of you have fur, some have scales, some have wings, but now you all share a problem. Namely, where have your wizards gone? After all, there is no food in the bowl! And that litter box isn't going to clean itself. Something has to be done, but what?

Maybe the wizards have gotten lost? Maybe something has happened to them? Needless to say, the hairless monkeys need your expert help!

Time to unite, and come to the rescue of your two-legged companions! I mean, after all, if they can do it, how hard can the whole adventuring thing be?

***

Have you ever wondered what familiars get up to when the wizards and witches are not around? Find out in this whimsical story about magic, friendship, and hairballs, as you take the roles of various kinds of familiars who must find out why their wizarding folk have left the wizard tower (and more importantly, the food bowl!) empty.

The story will take you on a journey through a different world than you normally see. The familiars experience the world very differently from how human adventurers experience it, and they bring very different abilities to bear to interact with it.

This game is rules-lite, and has lots of exploration and social interaction. Familiars are small, and aren't fighters, so there is very little combat. At most the occasional nipping and scratching.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Some scary monsters, and cats talking about eating mice. Little to no combat beyond the occasional nipping and scratching.

description:
ùóúùóªùòÅùóøùóº
The Silt Verses RPG is a tabletop roleplaying game of folk horror and monstrous divinity, where strange gods haunt the landscape and civilization is fueled by commonplace ritual sacrifice. In this game, a group of conscripted agents called Custodians are sent into isolated territories to deal with these monstrous gods, terrifying angels, and other divine manifestations in order to appease them, neutralize them, or otherwise engage with the locals to find a solution to the threats they present.

ùó¶ùòÅùòÜùóπùó≤ ùóºùó≥ ùóΩùóπùóÆùòÜ
The game focuses on narrative-driven horror investigation with an emphasis on cinematic play. Notably, the mystery the Custodians investigate has no canonical solution as it is discovered in collaboration with the players and the game master. The players are also periodically prompted to paint in details about the setting via improvised flash backs into the Custodians' pasts.

ùóñùóºùóªùòÅùó≤ùóªùòÅ ùòÑùóÆùóøùóªùó∂ùóªùó¥ùòÄ
The game contains some dark subject matter which may not be suitable for everyone, including intense themes of religious horror, human sacrifice, graphic violence, body horror, cults, implied harm to children and animals, family trauma and mental illness, government oppression and police violence, war, and natural disasters.

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Religious horror, human sacrifice, graphic violence, body horror, cults, implied harm to children and animals, family trauma and mental illness, government oppression and police violence, war, and natural disasters.

title: The Villepin Affair / Villepinin tapaus
description:
Paris, spring 1968. Famous scientist professor de Villepin is afraid of some nefarious actors attempting to steal his research ‚Äì or even take his life! Overburdened by the student protests, the police is reluctant to look into the matter, prompting the professor to seek help from you, his adventurer friends. Will you be able to solve the Villepin affair?

A free-wheeling adventure in the spirit of Tintin, Spirou & Fantasio, and other classic franco-belgian comics.

Pystyttek√∂ te selvitt√§m√§√§n Villepinin tapauksen?

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Korkeat paikat

title: There's A New Slayer In Town
description:
In the seemingly sleepy small town of Stillwater Hollow, a recent tragedy struck - a girl, Sandy Gallagher, was discovered dead under mysterious circumstances. This is now the fifth person in a string of strange deaths. Even though the locals are not aware, there's a need for a new slayer in this town - someone, who can take care of the supernatural occurrences that keep taking the lives of the unexpecting citizens. Who is the culprit, and what kind of skills are needed to defeat this evil? After all, we all know that teamwork is what makes the dream work, even if some slayers don't believe so...

The players will be playing with a set of pre-made characters. The setting is based on the TV show Buffy the Vampire Slayer, but knowledge of the show is not required. The game happens 20 years after the show has ended (not following comic canon). 

Please be aware that this is a horror-themed game, and as such contains mature topics (such as explicit descriptions, sexual themes and gore).

cachedAnnotations.ropecon:contentWarnings: Body horror, gore, sexually explicit descriptions, use of illicit substances (drugs, alcohol), descriptions of dead bodies.

title: Thirsty Sword Lesbians - Galaksiprinsessat  / Thirsty Sword Lesbians - Galactic Princess Guard
description:
*SUOMEKSI*
Galaksiprinsessat - kokoontukaa! Katala Rubiini-imperiumi on ry√∂st√§nyt prinsessaliiton syd√§nkristallin. Galaksiprinsessat on noustava uhkaa vastaan ja kohdattava pime√§n puolinen ex√§si ja kristalliin vangittu ihastuksesi sielu.

*ENGLISH*
Galactic Princesses - Assemble! The nefarious Ruby Empire has stolen the princess alliance's heart crystal. The galactic princesses must rise against the threat and face your dark side ex and the soul of your crush trapped within the crystal.

The game is played using the Thirsty Sword Lesbians system. Shera meets Star Wars in this epic adventure brimming with lesbian romance and lightsabers. The game is suitable for beginners.

title: Totally improvised game with New Worlds theme
description:
Mythic Game Master Emulator released its 2nd version at the beginning of 2023.

With Mythic you can play solo or without a GM any RPG. Let's have an improvised game where Mythic will guide us through it. There is no traditional GM in this game. This session is a great way to get to know the Mythic system if you are interested in solo playing.

The characters are built with QuestWorlds' as-you-go method so it is easy to get going without too much pre-work.

The genre and setting are decided at the beginning of the session. The game still has a theme: New Worlds.

The game will be held in English but if all the players speak Finnish it can be held in Finnish, too.

Mythic Game Master Emulatorin toinen versio julkaistiin vuoden 2023 alussa.

Pelin genre ja maailma valitaan alussa. Pelill√§ on kuitenkin teema: Uudet maailmat.

Peli pidet√§√§n ensisijaisesti englanniksi, paitsi jos kaikki pelaajat puhuvat suomea.
